channel.title: Secure and Reliable Source of Mathematical Constants in Rust
channel.description: The Common (CMN) library makes it easy to access a wide range of mathematical and cryptographic constants in Rust by providing a single, unified source for these constants.

image.title: Secure and Reliable Source of Mathematical Constants in Rust

item.author: Sebastien Rousseau
item.description: The Common (CMN) library makes it easy to access a wide range of mathematical and cryptographic constants in Rust by providing a single, unified source for these constants.
